item.description: Notes This queue-base is particularly finicky with piece order. Practice: https://jstris.jezevec10.com/play/mode/2971 Setups IS ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gQ4IeR4BeQ4Eeg0Q4BtR4Dei0BtQ4zhJeAgH.png]] ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gA8Bti0wwilB8BtA8g0xwRpF8wwglRpJ8JeAgH.png]] SO ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gQ4IeR4BeQ4Eeg0Q4BtR4RpBei0BtQ4RpLeAgH.png]] ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gA8Btzhglh0B8BtA8ilg0wwH8xwH8g0wwJeAgH.png]] LO ![[attachments_fumen/v115@JhglBeRpBeg0BeglBtRpR4g0BehlBtR4h0JeAgH.png]] !

item.title: 2nd: ISZO
item.description: ISZO is a symmetrical queue. Take note of if mirroring the setup is beneficial, such as for some queue-based setups.

item.title: 2nd: LSZO
item.description: LSZO is one of the worst queues for 2nd PC. 3-piece setups are preferred in order to increase solve percentage.

item.title: 2nd: TISZ
item.description: TISZ is a symmetrical queue. Take note of if mirroring the setup is beneficial, such as for some queue-based setups.

item.title: First Perfect Clear
item.description: Setups [[perfect-clears/1st/Perfect Clear Opener]] [[perfect-clears/1st/Jigsaw]] v115@9gzhFeh0BtFeg0RpBtEeg0RpQeAgH Sol: 98.333% v115@DhzhFeR4hlEeR4RpglGeRpglJeAgH Sol: 98.214%

item.title: Jigsaw
item.description: Jigsaw is a high scoring first, sacrificing solve% for scoring. It has a 100% build chance, considering mirrors, and the less efficient alternate build.

item.title: Perfect Clear Opener
item.description: Shortened as PCO. An opener for getting a perfect clear. The build rate is 100% if an [[#alternative build]] is considered.

item.title: Perfect Clears
item.description: Here are setups for various perfect clears. More to come later Categories [[perfect-clears/1st/1st_index|1st PC]] [[perfect-clears/2nd/2nd_index|2nd PC]] 3rd [[perfect-clears/dpc/dpc_index|DPC]] 4th 5th 6th [[perfect-clears/7th/7th|7th PC]] 8th 9th

item.title: S/Z DPC
item.description: Solution Finder Selected Setup v115@2gRpEewhBeRpEewhCeR4Bthlwhg0AeT4Btglwhi0R4?CeglJeAgH SELECT SETUP QUEUE 180/90 CHECKBOX COMPACT RESULTS DPC MINIMALS: SIX HUNDRED SCORING: ZERO EXTRA SOLUTIONS: FOURTEEN THOUSAND BUILD COVER: ZERO PERCENT v115@9gRpg0zhywRpg0B8Q4hlwwAtA8h0B8R4glBtF8Q4gl?
